CustomField.description: User Story No. 164369 & 135049. Developed in Pi-02, Sprint-1, and Sprint-2. This field is used during developing map collections preparation to capture the School Name that is linked to the Academic Program on the Program Enrollment records associated with a Student. This field is used in the Program Enrollment Batch Job and the Relationship Batch Job code logic to identify the School Names while processing.
CustomField.label: School Name
